author: Special Correspondent
V S
text:
Photo exhibition

A state-level photo expo- ‘Photo Feast 2016’- organised by Nature Conservation Society (NCS), Nehru Arts and Science College (NASC) and Tamil Nadu Forest Department began on the college premises at Thirumalaiyampalayam near Madukkarai on Wednesday.

The expo with 2,500 photographs from about 500 professional and amateur wildlife photographers from Tamil Nadu, Karnataka and Kerala are on display. The expo will be on till January 8, said N.I. Jalaludeen, President of NCS.

Eminent experts from the field of nature, wildlife, ecology, and environment are conducting workshops every day to sensitise the student visitors.
title: Photo Feast 2016 expo begins
